name: Scooby Doo! & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Adventure
description: Solve the mystery of Kraken Cove with Scooby, Shaggy and the rest of the Mystery Machine Gang or help Bugs and Daffy discover who is behind the dastardly defective MOCME products that are creating chaos. Solve puzzles and fight enemies as you unlock the mysteries in this exciting cartoon world come to life.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32 Bit: Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Intel Dual Core 1.8GHz OR AMD Athlon X2 2 2.3GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6600 256MB OR Radeon X1600 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 32 Bit: Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz OR AMD Athlon X2 2.8GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS 256MB OR Radeon HD 3850 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0c

reviews.review_text: This game okay. Funny and entertaining. But wait until this game goes on sale. Not really worth the $19.99.
Police Officer grabbed and bagged me. 10/10
